articles.content: Former India cricketer Vinoo Mankad on Sunday was among the 10 players included in the special edition list of the International Cricket Council's (ICC) Hall of Fame. The ICC announced a special edit… [+1658 chars]

articles.title: French Open: Barbora Krejcikova completes rare Roland Garros double - BBC News
articles.description: Barbora Krejcikova completes a rare feat at the French Open by adding the women's doubles title to her singles success.
articles.content:
Krejcikova (right) is the only active player to have won Grand Slam singles, doubles and mixed doubles titles in a single season
Barbora Krejcikova says she will enjoy a rare glass of champagne to c… [+1878 chars]

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Australia's Kaylee McKeown Smashes, 19, Women's 100m Backstroke World Record - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: Kaylee McKeown broke the women's 100m backstroke world record on Sunday after clocking 57.45 sec at Australian Olympic trials in Adelaide.
articles.content: Teenager Kaylee McKeown smashed the women's 100m backstroke world record Sunday, touching in 57.45sec at the Australian Olympic trials in Adelaide, dedicating it to her father who died last year. The… [+1235 chars]

articles.title: 'One of the Senior Players Came to Mock Me' - Suresh Raina Reveals Team Dynamics in Greg Chappell Er - News18
articles.description: Former India batsman Suresh Raina credited ex coach Greg Chappell for helping develop youngsters in the team, and shed light on the relationship dynamics between seniors and juniors when he broke into the team in mid 2000s.
